subject: IES Reader Wave 3: Mobile UX improvements and styling updates - All code changes committed and verified
body: All code changes related to Text Selection -> Note Integration styling, General Mobile UX (Touch Target Sizing), CSS class refactoring, and TypeScript error fixes have been committed to feature/ies-reader-enhancement. The worktree is clean and the build is successful. Manual mobile testing is now the only remaining step for polishing and edge cases. Please refer to previous instructions for testing. Awaiting user feedback.
